name_the_service.message: Please, select a name matching the search engine you will wrapp

select_the_input_control.message: Please, point and click on the element of the page that you identify as the input control of the search form.

trigger_mechanism_instructions.message: Select the mechanism that the page search engine uses to retrieve search results.

select_the_trigger_control.message: Point and click on the page element that you identify as the control that <b>triggers</> a search

click_on_control_to_trigger.message: Click on a control (button, anchor, etc.)

click_on_trigger_error.message: You did not select any element on the page as the search trigger of the engine.

default_missing_requirement.message: Sorry, there are some requirements that are not met in this form

results_selection_instructions.message: Please, point and click on the element of the page you identify as «container» of each result returned by the search engine. Then, choose the number of occurrences you identify.

results_tagging_instructions.message: Tag the result type you identify.

results_tag.message: Kind of results the engine retrieves
